author: defirion
title: Fantastic set
review:
Way back whe this was released, I was sceptical about shelling out $50 on a Lego set. After a job, I'm not so hesitant, but back then I was still wary. So when this came on sale for $25, I was quick to get it.

Pros: A large ship with a wide variety of pieces
two minifigs including Jango Fett
Wide armorment
Lots of play vale

Cons: Kind of frail


All in all, a great set to get. And, as always, much better if you can get it cheap.
